alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 6:34PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN SWITZERLAND AND EASTERN CARROLL COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 634 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Vevay, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Vevay, Pleasant, Fairview, Ghent, Prestonville, Braytown, Easterday, General Butler State Park, Mount Sterling, Jacksonville and Moorefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
